display_long_description:
Laugh, jump, or scream—it’s all part of the fun! Face towering heights, creepy crawlies, and robotic murder clowns as you challenge your fears. Don’t “**NOPE**” out too soon! If you do, retreat to **Breather Space** with Mr. Peels and Coco to calm your nerves and maybe feed some fish before diving back in. Push your phobia limits, or just have a blast! **NOPE CHALLENGE** reveals which fear makes your heart race the most!
[media]
🔥 **Explore the NOPE CHALLENGES:**

**Nine Unique NOPE CHALLENGES! Featuring Clowns, Heights, and Spiders**, each available in Light, Moderate, or EXTREME intensity levels. Everyone's different—what's easy for one person might be super scary for someone else. For instance, although most players say clowns are the least feared, our data shows that our clowns (especially Dioko!) are the ones they NOPE OUT of the most!


🆘 **Your Fun Escape: The NOPE Button & Breather Space**

If things get too intense, hit the **NOPE Button** to take a break in the **Breather Space**. Here, you can relax with **Mr. Peels** and **Coco** who you will rescue from their own phobia challenges. They don't talk, but they will laugh and scream. Save them to make new friends and hang out together.

🤩 **Fun for Everyone to Play and Watch:**

It's not just fun to play, but also awesome to watch others! Since everyone reacts differently, you never know if someone will laugh, scream, or hit the **NOPE Button** right away. 


**NOPE CHALLENGE** turns your phobias into a thrilling experience. Get ready to face your fears while having tons of fun!
